sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react' import './MovieCard.css' import Modal from 'react-bootstrap/Modal' export default function MovieCard(props) { const [showModalBox, setShowModalBox] = useState(false) const [imdbData, setImdbData] = useState([]) const showModal = () => { console.log('hi fro modal') let url = 'http://www.omdbapi.com/?i=' + props.imdbID + '&plot=full&apikey=328cb361' fetch(url) .then(res => res.json()) .then(res => setImdbData(res)) setShowModalBox(true) } const handleClose = () => setShowModalBox(false); console.log('imdbrating', imdbData) return (

{props.name}

{props.year}

{props.imdbID}

More Info
{ imdbData.length > 0 ?

{imdbData.Title}

{imdbData.Actors}

{imdbData.Language}

:null }
) }
